item.title: Karlijn Dinnissen has successfully passed her first-year assessment
item.description:
Today, Karlijn Dinnissen had the first-year assessment of her PhD plan. As expected, she successfully passed this stage. The external reviewer, Michael Ekstrand, confirmed that she is well on track in her PhD journey. Congratulations to Karlijn! And thank you to Michael Ekstrand for serving as a reviewer.

Karlijn entitled her presentation “Improving Fairness and Transparency for Item Providers in Multi-Stakeholder Music Recommender Systems”. The item providers are the artists—in case you wondered. :-)

item.title: Panelist at the Doctoral Symposium of RecSys 2022: PhD and career journey
